Text.Page: You faced the Dark Master of Dragons once more, but you didn't have a chance against his power. Just when all hope seemed lost, you fell into your own personal purgatory.

Not far from here, we saw another teleportal device, like the one we saw at Wyrmgorge!

The Vergos cultist must have used it. I'll stay here to advise the federation troops.

You should hurry. You can probably still catch him!

We meet again, .

We are in a representation of the depths of your soul, where all of your Inner Demons dwell.
Frustration, anxiety, regret... everything you cannot let go of.
They are a part of who you are, but because they partially control you, you perceive them as enemies to defeat.

, you must overcome your Temper.
